EmailTemplate.name: LE-03-16-202203-HHS-HAC-SEVT-SAGES.post-event-2-non-attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: What you missed at SAGES 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Sorry we missed you We’re sorry we missed you at this year’s SAGES Annual Meeting! It can be tough to find the time to see everything at these events, so we wanted to make sure you had details about our new Virtual Operating Room solution <[[https://teladochealth.com/virtual-operating-room/?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=202203-hhs-hac-sevt-sages&utm_content=post-event]]> showcased at SAGES 2022. Get more information, incuding details on our integration with Proximie, here <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/brochure/HHS/virtual-operating-room-solution-overview/?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=202203-hhs-hac-sevt-sages&utm_content=post-event]]>. We’d welcome the opportunity to discuss how we might help you achieve your organization’s goals. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
